channel.title: How do i make my objects face a different way?
channel.description:
makeGlobalObject(2076, 3256, 2213, 3, 10);//bankbooth
I thought the 3 was the direction but ive changed it to 1 2 3 4 and its still facing the same way. Is this source just bad? Its Naderpkz V2 The npcdrop.cfg doesnt work either. NPC id Drop type Item id Amount npcdrop = 3340 1 1048 100

@kicker862 wrote:

    makeGlobalObject(2076, 3256, 2213, 3, 10);//bankbooth

I thought the 3 was the direction but ive changed it to 1 2 3 4 and its still facing the same way.
Is this source just bad?
Its Naderpkz V2
The npcdrop.cfg doesnt work either.
NPC id Drop type Item id Amount
npcdrop = 3340 1 1048 100
